dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni dashed into the faculty office before I could say anything and a big fuss ensued which ended with her quite promptly getting grabbed by Mr. Watanabe and then given another month of detention.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: She really needs to think before she does these things...

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I thought to myself as I grabbed my bags to go home.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: It was then that my eyes caught a glimpse of a beautiful blonde girl.
Excuse me, my name is Akane, um I am looking for a friend of mine who is a member of the Music club

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I took Akane to the music room and we chatted about all kinds of things! She is super nice, pretty and single! Maybe my year is turning around?
